entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
